info.official_title: Adjuvant Chemoradiotherapy Followed by Zimberelimab for Locally Advanced Cervical Cancer (IB3, IIA2) Patients

identified_line.line: * Histologically confirmed cervical squamous cell carcinoma, cervical adenocarcinoma, or cervical adenosquamous carcinoma;

criterions.exact_snippets: Histologically confirmed cervical squamous cell carcinoma

or_criteria.exact_snippets: Histologically confirmed cervical squamous cell carcinoma

identified_line.line: * According to FIGO2018 staging, patients with locally advanced cervical cancer (IB3, IIA2) who require concurrent radiotherapy and chemotherapy;

criterions.exact_snippets: FIGO2018 staging, patients with locally advanced cervical cancer (IB3, IIA2)

and_criteria.exact_snippets: FIGO2018 staging, patients with locally advanced cervical cancer (IB3, IIA2)

identified_line.line: * Patients with radical surgery for cervical cancer;
* Female patients: 18-70 years old;
* ECOG physical condition score: 0~1 point;
Must be FEMALE
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 70 Years
* Subjects have histological subtypes other than those permitted by inclusion criteria;

criterions.exact_snippets: Subjects have histological subtypes other than those permitted by inclusion criteria

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Subjects have histological subtypes other than those permitted by inclusion criteria

identified_line.line: * Severe hypersensitivity to cepalizumab and/or any of its excipients (≥ grade 3);

criterions.exact_snippets: Severe hypersensitivity to cepalizumab and/or any of its excipients (≥ grade 3)
Severe hypersensitivity to cepalizumab and/or any of its excipients (≥ grade 3)
criterions.criterion: hypersensitivity to any excipients of cepalizumab

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Severe hypersensitivity to cepalizumab and/or any of its excipients (≥ grade 3)
Severe hypersensitivity to cepalizumab and/or any of its excipients (≥ grade 3)
and_criteria.criterion: hypersensitivity to any excipients of cepalizumab

identified_line.line: * Participate in or have participated in other clinical trials within 4 weeks before enrollment;

criterions.exact_snippets: Participate in or have participated in other clinical trials within 4 weeks before enrollment

not_criteria.exact_snippets: Participate in or have participated in other clinical trials within 4 weeks before enrollment

identified_line.line: * Have received or will receive inactivated vaccine within 30 days prior to the first study treatment;

criterions.exact_snippets: Have received or will receive inactivated vaccine within 30 days prior to the first study treatment

requirement.expected_value: within 30 days prior to the first study treatment

not_criteria.exact_snippets: Have received or will receive inactivated vaccine within 30 days prior to the first study treatment

requirement.expected_value: within 30 days prior to the first study treatment

identified_line.line: * Received a combination of systemic immune stimulants, colony-stimulating factors, interferon, interleukin, and vaccine within 6 weeks or 5 half-lives (if shorter) prior to initial administration;

criterions.exact_snippets: Received a combination of systemic immune stimulants
Received a combination of ... colony-stimulating factors

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Received a combination of systemic immune stimulants
Received a combination of ... colony-stimulating factors
Received a combination of systemic immune stimulants
Received a combination of ... colony-stimulating factors

identified_line.line: * Have been diagnosed with an immune deficiency or are receiving chronic systemic steroid therapy (doses greater than 10mg daily equivalent of prednisone) or any other form of immunosuppressive therapy within 7 days prior to the first dose;

criterions.exact_snippets: Have been diagnosed with an immune deficiency
receiving chronic systemic steroid therapy (doses greater than 10mg daily equivalent of prednisone)
receiving ... any other form of immunosuppressive therapy within 7 days prior to the first dose

requirement.expected_value: within 7 days prior to the first dose

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Have been diagnosed with an immune deficiency
receiving chronic systemic steroid therapy (doses greater than 10mg daily equivalent of prednisone)
receiving ... any other form of immunosuppressive therapy within 7 days prior to the first dose

requirement.expected_value: within 7 days prior to the first dose

identified_line.line: * Have an active autoimmune disease in the past 2 years that requires systemic treatment (such as the use of disease-modulating drugs, corticosteroids, or immunosuppressive drugs);

criterions.exact_snippets: disease-modulating drugs, corticosteroids, or immunosuppressive drugs

and_criteria.exact_snippets: disease-modulating drugs, corticosteroids, or immunosuppressive drugs

identified_line.line: * Have a history of (non-infectious) pneumonia requiring steroid treatment or have a current (non-infectious) pneumonia;

criterions.exact_snippets: Have a history of (non-infectious) pneumonia requiring steroid treatment

or_criteria.exact_snippets: Have a history of (non-infectious) pneumonia requiring steroid treatment

identified_line.line: * An active infection requiring systematic treatment;

criterions.exact_snippets: An active infection requiring systematic treatment

not_criteria.exact_snippets: An active infection requiring systematic treatment

identified_line.line: * Known history of HIV infection;
* A known history of hepatitis B (defined as HBsAg reactive) or known active hepatitis C virus (defined as detection of HCV RNA[qualitative]) infection;

criterions.exact_snippets: A known history of hepatitis B (defined as HBsAg reactive)
A known history of hepatitis B (defined as HBsAg reactive)
known active hepatitis C virus (defined as detection of HCV RNA[qualitative]) infection
known active hepatitis C virus (defined as detection of HCV RNA[qualitative]) infection

and_criteria.exact_snippets: A known history of hepatitis B (defined as HBsAg reactive)
A known history of hepatitis B (defined as HBsAg reactive)
known active hepatitis C virus (defined as detection of HCV RNA[qualitative]) infection
known active hepatitis C virus (defined as detection of HCV RNA[qualitative]) infection

identified_line.line: * Known active tuberculosis (TB; Tuberculosis) medical history;

criterions.exact_snippets: Known active tuberculosis (TB; Tuberculosis) medical history
Known active tuberculosis (TB; Tuberculosis) medical history

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Known active tuberculosis (TB; Tuberculosis) medical history
Known active tuberculosis (TB; Tuberculosis) medical history

identified_line.line: * Has received allogeneic tissue/solid organ transplantation;

criterions.exact_snippets: Has received allogeneic tissue/solid organ transplantation

not_criteria.exact_snippets: Has received allogeneic tissue/solid organ transplantation

identified_line.line: * Suffering from central nervous system metastases such as brain metastases;
* Patients with uncontrolled chest and abdominal fluid;
* Patients with mobility disorders such as pathological fractures caused by tumor bone metastasis;
* Insufficient hematopoietic function of bone marrow;

criterions.exact_snippets: Insufficient hematopoietic function of bone marrow

not_criteria.exact_snippets: Insufficient hematopoietic function of bone marrow

identified_line.line: * Abnormal liver;
* Abnormal kidney;
* Bleeding risk;
* Cardiovascular and cerebrovascular abnormalities.
* Subjects have not received previous immunotherapy;

criterions.exact_snippets: Subjects have not received previous immunotherapy

identified_line.line: * Expected survival ≥6 months;

* Women of reproductive age should agree to use contraceptives (such as Iuds, contraceptives, or condoms) during the study period and for 6 months after the study ends; Have a negative serum or urine pregnancy test within 7 days prior to study enrollment and must be a non-lactating patient;

criterions.exact_snippets: agree to use contraceptives (such as Iuds, contraceptives, or condoms) during the study period and for 6 months after the study ends

requirement.expected_value: during the study period and for 6 months after the study ends

criterions.exact_snippets: Have a negative serum or urine pregnancy test within 7 days prior to study enrollment
Have a negative serum or urine pregnancy test within 7 days prior to study enrollment

requirement.expected_value: within 7 days prior to study enrollment

identified_line.line: * For adequate organ function as defined in the protocol, test samples must be collected within 7 days prior to initiation of the study therapy

criterions.exact_snippets: test samples must be collected within 7 days prior to initiation of the study therapy

identified_line.line: * Subjects voluntarily joined the study, signed informed consent, had good compliance, and cooperated with follow-up.
Healthy volunteers allowed
